title: Right x Light - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Special Abilities
author: Tsukasa   ツカサ
description:
Anything my right hand can hold on to will disappear——I have the ability to make things disappear into thin air. At school, I used to pretend to be an amateur magician and that's how it should've been, that is, until the day I met......Alice.

“——You haven’t a choice, you've got to believe me.'

In a semi-transparent state, she ordered to me while floating down. My feet suddenly became weightless, while my body felt heavy and tired......wait, why are you doing this to me? Apparently Alice was trying to recover her body from some thief in this 'Ark' thing.>
